text: “Kooe go tangada dangada, helekai ang gi di tagi o Tyre i nia mee ala e helekai iei Au, go Tagi go Yihowah, ang gi mee: Idimaa i do hagalaamua aga goe, gei goe gu hagamaanadu bolo goe guu hai be dahi god dela e noho i lodo dono lohongo e haganiga mai go di moana. Goe e hagamaanadu bolo goe di god, gei deeai, goe tangada hua dangada, hagalee e mouli deeodi.
